entries.name: Arteria Danneggiata
entries.description: Causa 4 @Condition[Bleeding]. Senza una Chirurgia ogni ulteriore colpo al torso causerà 2 @Condition[Bleeding].

entries.name: Brutto Taglio
entries.description: Causa 2 @Condition[Bleeding]. Superare una Prova Impegnativa (+0) di Tempra per non cadere @Condition[Prone].

entries.name: Brutto Taglio al Dito
entries.description: Causa 1 @Condition[Bleeding]. Dopo l’incontro, superare una Prova Impegnativa (+0) di Tempra per non perdere il dito; @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.ZhMADOqoo0y8Q9bx]{Amputation (Average)}.

entries.name: Tremore Grave
entries.description: Il braccio trema per il colpo e la mano lascia cadere quello che stringeva, diventando inutilizzabile per [[/r 1d10]] - Bonus Resistenza Round (minimo 1). In questo periodo è considerata persa (vedere Amputazioni).

entries.name: Brutta Storta al Ginocchio
entries.description: Il ginocchio viene ruotato malamente, nel tentativo di schivare l’avversario. Causa uno @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.3S4OYOZLauXctmev]{Torn Muscle (Major)}.

entries.name: Occhio Nero
entries.description: Un colpo molto doloroso all’occhio. Causa 2 @Condition[Blinded].

entries.name: Mano Sanguinante
entries.description: Un brutto taglio alla mano rende la presa incerta. Causa 1 @Condition[Bleeding] e finché non viene rimosso bisogna fare una Prova Media (+20) di Destrezza prima di ogni Azione che coinvolge stringere un oggetto in mano. In caso di fallimento lo strumento cade.

entries.name: Cassa Toracica Frantumata
entries.description: Causa 1 @Condition[Unconscious] che può essere rimosso solo con cure mediche, e un @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.EaqlLRQigwnsEAXX]{Broken Bone (Major)}.

entries.name: Mascella Rotta
entries.description: La mascella si rompe con uno schiocco tremendo. Causa 3 @Condition[Stunned] e richiede una Prova Impegnativa (+0) di Tempra per non subire anche @Condition[Unconscious]. Provoca @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.hCadFsTRvLN9faaY]{Broken Bone (Major)}.

entries.name: Ginocchio Rotto
entries.description: Il colpo fa a pezzi la rotula. Causa 1 @Condition[Bleeding], 1 @Condition[Prone], e 1 @Condition[Stunned], e un @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.2iult41Jehz0F1O8]{Broken Bone (Major)}.

entries.name: Naso Rotto
entries.description: Un colpo in mezzo al viso causa un’emoraggia. Causa 2 @Condition[Bleeding] e richiede una Prova Impegnativa (+0) di Tempra per non subire anche 1 @Condition[Stunned]. Una volta guarita, la ferita provoca +1/-1 LS nelle Prove sociali a meno di non riallineare il naso con la @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.WCivInLZrqEtZzF4#surgery]{Surgery}.

entries.name: Livido alle Costole
entries.description: Penalità di -10 in tutte le Prove basate su Agilità per [[/r 1d10]] giorni.

entries.name: Smembramento
entries.description: Il braccio viene smembrato e spruzza sangue per [[/r 1d10]]×30cm in direzione casuale (see @Table[scatter]{Scatter}), prima che il colpo affondi nel torace.

entries.name: Carved Shin
entries.description: The weapon drives clean through your leg by the knee, slicing into bone and through tendons. Gain a @Condition[Stunned] and @Condition[Prone] Condition. Further, suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.3S4OYOZLauXctmev]{Torn Muscle (Major)} and @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.7mCcI3q7hgWcmbBU]{Broken Bone (Minor)} injury.

entries.name: Clean Break
entries.description: An audible crack resounds as the blow strikes your arm. Drop whatever was held in the associated hand and gain a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.4lj1ik958mbgAlaF]{Broken Bone (Minor)} injury. Pass a Difficult (-10) Endurance Test or gain a @Condition[Stunned] Condition.

entries.name: Cleft Hand
entries.description: Your hand splays open from the blow. Lose 1 finger — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.SYjWiKDzMS6CtROJ]{Amputation (Difficult)}. Gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding] and 1 @Condition[Stunned] Condition. For every succeeding Round in which you don't receive Medical Attention, you lose another finger as the wound tears; if you run out of fingers, you lose the hand — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.SYjWiKDzMS6CtROJ]{Amputation (Difficult)}.

entries.name: Concussive Blow
entries.description: Your brain rattles in your skull as blood spurts from your nose and ears. Take 1 @Condition[Deafened], 2 @Condition[Bleeding] , and [[/r 1d10]] @Condition[Stunned] Conditions. Gain a @Condition[Fatigued] Condition that lasts for [[/r 1d10]] days. If you receive another Critical Wound to your head while suffering this Fatigued Condition, make an Average (+20) Endurance Test or also gain an @Condition[Unconscious] Condition.

entries.name: Cracked Ribs
entries.description: The hit cracks one or more ribs. Gain a @Condition[Stunned] Condition. Gain a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.QluSTTTq3viHJJUh]{Broken Bone (Minor)} injury.

entries.name: Crushed Elbow
entries.description: The blow crushes your elbow, splintering bone and cartilage. You immediately drop whatever was held in that hand and gain a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.rlDZZTj5PXjuRXa2]{Broken Bone (Major)} injury.

entries.name: Crushed Foot
entries.description: The blow crushes your foot. Make an Average (+20) Endurance Test; if you fail, gain the @Condition[Prone] condition and lose 1 toe, plus 1 additional toe for each SL below 0 — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.ZhMADOqoo0y8Q9bx]{Amputation (Average)}. Gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions. If you don't receive Surgery within [[/r 1d10]] days, you will lose the foot entirely.

entries.name: Cut Tendon
entries.description: A major tendon at the back of your leg is cut, causing you to scream out in pain as your leg collapses. Gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding], 2 @Condition[Stunned], and 1 @Condition[Prone] Condition and look on in horror as your leg never works again — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.k00PimCWkff11IA0]{Amputation (Very Hard)}.

entries.name: Damaged Artery
entries.description:
Gain 4 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions. Until you receive @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.WCivInLZrqEtZzF4#surgery]{Surgery}, every time you take Damage to this Arm Hit Location gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions.

The Active Effect for this item needs your input. Replace ARM_LOCATION_HERE with lArm or rArm

entries.name: Decapitated
entries.description: Your head is entirely severed from your neck and soars through the air, landing [[/r 1d10]] feet away in a random direction (see @Table[scatter]{Scatter}). Your body collapses, instantly dead.

entries.name: Deep Cut
entries.description: Gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions as your arm is mangled. Gain 1 @Condition[Stunned] Condition and suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.GlShFJF2TpsNh1FX]{Torn Muscle (Minor)} injury. Take a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the @Condition[Unconscious] Condition.

entries.name: Devastated Eye
entries.description: A strike to your eye completely bursts it, causing extraordinary pain. Gain 3 @Condition[Blinded], 2 @Condition[Bleeding], and 1 @Condition[Stunned] Condition. Lose your eye — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.weczkAMPlTjX7lqU]{Amputation (Difficult)}.

entries.name: Disfiguring Blow
entries.description: The blow smashes your entire face, destroying your eye and nose in a cloud of blood. Gain 3 @Condition[Bleeding], 3 @Condition[Blinded] and 2 @Condition[Stunned] Conditions. Lose your @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.weczkAMPlTjX7lqU]{eye} and @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.SpPRZZRHxly7uo2G]{nose} — Amputation (Hard).

entries.name: Dislocated Knee
entries.description: Your knee is wrenched out of its socket. Gain the @Condition[Prone] Condition. Pass a Hard (-20) Endurance Test, or gain the @Condition[Stunned] Condition, which is not removed until you receive Medical Attention. After this initial Medical Attention, an Extended Average (+20) Heal Test needing 6 SL is required to reset the knee at which point you regain its use. Movement is halved, and Tests made using this leg suffer a -10 penalty for [[/r d10]] days.

entries.name: Dislocated Shoulder
entries.description: Your arm is wrenched out of its socket. Pass a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the @Condition[Stunned] and @Condition[Prone] Condition. Drop whatever is held in that hand: the arm is useless and counts as lost (see @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.MnMZv7ZXoRqoH9dS]{Amputated Part}). Gain 1 @Condition[Stunned] Condition until you receive Medical Attention. After this initial Medical Attention, an Extended Average (+20) Heal Test needing 6 SL is required to reset the arm, at which point you regain its use. Tests made using this arm suffer a -10 penalty for [[/r 1d10]] days.

entries.name: Dramatic Injury
entries.description: A fine wound across the forehead and cheek. Gain 1 @Condition[Bleeding] Condition. Once the wound is healed, the impressive scar it leaves provides a bonus of +1 SL to appropriate social Tests. You can only gain this benefit once.

entries.name: Ear Bash
entries.description: Your ear takes a sickening impact, leaving it ringing. Gain 1 @Condition[Deafened] Condition.

entries.name: Fractured Hip
entries.description: Gain a @Condition[Stunned] Condition. Take a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or also gain the @Condition[Prone] Condition. Suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.QluSTTTq3viHJJUh]{Broken Bone (Minor)} injury.

entries.name: Fractured Jaw
entries.description: With a sickening crunch, pain fills your face as the blow fractures your jaw. Gain 2 @Condition[Stunned] Conditions. Suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.nbhn2wX35b7Jrcbg]{Broken Bone (Minor)} injury.

entries.name: Gaping Arm Wound
entries.description:
The blow opens a deep, gaping wound. Gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions. Until you receive @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.WCivInLZrqEtZzF4#surgery]{Surgery} to stitch up the cut, any associated Arm Damage you receive will also inflict 1 @Condition[Bleeding] Condition as the wound reopens.

The Active Effect for this item needs your input. Replace ARM_LOCATION_HERE with lArm or rArm

entries.name: Gaping Chest Wound
entries.description: Take 3 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions. Until you receive @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.WCivInLZrqEtZzF4#surgery]{Surgery}, any Wounds you receive to the Body Hit Location will inflict an additional Bleeding Condition as the cut reopens.

entries.name: Gut Blow
entries.description: Gain 1 @Condition[Stunned] Condition. Pass an Easy (+40) Endurance Test, or vomit, gaining the @Condition[Prone] Condition.

entries.name: Gut Wound
entries.description: Contract a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.diseases.kKccDTGzWzSXCBOb]{Festering Wound} and gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions.

entries.name: Hacked Leg
entries.description: A cut bites down into the hip. Gain 1 @Condition[Prone] and 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions, and suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.7mCcI3q7hgWcmbBU]{Broken Bone (Minor)} injury. Further, take a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or also gain a @Condition[Stunned] condition from the pain.

entries.name: Internal Bleeding
entries.description: Gain a @Condition[Bleeding] Condition that can only be removed through @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.WCivInLZrqEtZzF4#surgery]{Surgery}. Contract @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.diseases.M8XyRs9DN12XsFTQ]{Blood Rot}.

entries.name: Jarred Arm
entries.description: Your arm is jarred in the attack. Drop whatever was held in that hand.

entries.name: Lost Footing
entries.description: In the scuffle you lose your footing. Pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain the @Condition[Prone] Condition.

entries.name: Low Blow!
entries.description: Make a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain 3 @Condition[Stunned] Condition.

entries.name: Major Chest Wound
entries.description: You take a significant wound to your chest, flensing skin from muscle and sinew. Take 4 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions. Until you receive @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.WCivInLZrqEtZzF4#surgery]{Surgery}, to stitch the wound together, any Wounds you receive to the Body Hit Location will also inflict 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions as the tears reopen.

entries.name: Major Ear Wound
entries.description: The blow damages your ear, leaving you with permanent hearing loss in one ear. Suffer a -20 penalty on all Tests relating to hearing. If you suffer this result again, your hearing is permanently lost as the second ear falls quiet. Only magic can heal this.

entries.name: Major Eye Wound
entries.description: The blow cracks across your eye socket. Gain 1 @Condition[Bleeding] Condition. Also gain 1 @Condition[Blinded] Condition that cannot be removed until you receive Medical Attention.

entries.name: Mangled Ear
entries.description: Little is left of your ear as the blow tears it apart. You gain 3 @Condition[Deafened] and 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions. Lose your ear — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.8piWcBKFlQ2J1E3A]{Amputatation (Average)}.

entries.name: Mangled Hand
entries.description: Your hand is left a mauled, bleeding mess. You lose your hand — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.zyocWSzEZEC826NS]{{Amputation (Hard)}. Gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Condition. Take a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the @Condition[Stunned] and @Condition[Prone] Conditions.

entries.name: Mangled Jaw
entries.description: The blow almost removes your jaw as it utterly destroys your tongue, sending teeth flying in a shower of blood. Gain 4 @Condition[Bleeding] and 3 @Condition[Stunned] Conditions. Make a Very Hard (-30) Endurance Test or gain an @Condition[Unconscious] Condition. Suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.hCadFsTRvLN9faaY]{Broken Bone (Major)} injury and lose your @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.rkJA1DlK51QuRlJy]{tongue} and [[/r 1d10]] @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.fBcZhOBn8IpoVqQ1]{teeth}— Amputation (Hard).

entries.name: Mauled Bicep
entries.description: The blow almost separates bicep and tendon from bone, leaving an ugly wound that sprays blood over you and your opponent. You automatically drop anything held in the associated hand and suffers a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.qn4ZpvTQIX4rcJDl]{Torn Muscle (Major)} injury and 2 @Condition[Bleeding] and 1 @Condition[Stunned] Condition.

entries.name: Minor Arm Cut
entries.description: Gain a @Condition[Bleeding] Condition as your upper arm is cut badly.

entries.name: Minor Head Cut
entries.description: The strike opens your cheek and blood flies everywhere. Gain 1 @Condition[Bleeding] Condition.

entries.name: Minor Leg Cut
entries.description: Gain 1 @Condition[Bleeding] Condition.

entries.name: Painful Cut
entries.description: Gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions and a @Condition[Stunned] Condition. Take a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the @Condition[Unconscious] Condition as you black out from the pain. Unless you achieve 4+ SL, you also scream out in agony.

entries.name: Poked Eye
entries.description: The blow glances across your eye socket. Gain 1 @Condition[Blinded] condition.

entries.name: Pulled Back
entries.description: Your back turns to white pain as you pull a muscle. Suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.eWPN3CV2Eddwz8aM]{Torn Muscle (Major)} injury.

entries.name: Ragged Wound
entries.description: Take 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions.

entries.name: Rattling Blow
entries.description: The blow floods your vision with spots and flashing lights. Gain 1 @Condition[Stunned] Condition.

entries.name: Ruptered Ligament
entries.description: You immediately drop whatever was held in that hand. Suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.qn4ZpvTQIX4rcJDl]{Torn Muscle (Major)} injury.

entries.name: Ruptured Tendon
entries.description: Gain a @Condition[Prone] and @Condition[Stunned] Condition as one of your tendons tears badly. Pass a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the @Condition[Unconscious] Condition. Your leg is useless. Suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.3S4OYOZLauXctmev]{Torn Muscle (Major)} injury.

entries.name: Severed Finger
entries.description: You gape in horror as a finger flies — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.SYjWiKDzMS6CtROJ]{Amputation (Average)}. Gain a @Condition[Bleeding] condition.

entries.name: Severed Foot
entries.description: Your foot is severed at the ankle and lands [[/r 1d10]] feet away in a random direction — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.gz2xy41OSVZ8YBgI]{Amputation (Hard)}. You gain 3 @Condition[Bleeding], 2 @Condition[Stunned], and 1 @Condition[Prone] Condition.

entries.name: Shattered Pelvis
entries.description: The blow shatters your pelvis, severing one leg then driving through to the next. You die instantly from traumatic shock.

entries.name: Sliced Ear
entries.description: Your side of your head takes a hard blow, cutting deep into your ear. Gain 2 @Condition[Deafened] and 1 @Condition[Bleeding] Condition.

entries.name: Sliced Tendons
entries.description: Your tendons are cut by the blow, leaving your arm hanging useless — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.MnMZv7ZXoRqoH9dS]{Amputation (Very Hard)}. Gain 3 @Condition[Bleeding], 1 @Condition[Prone], and 1 @Condition[Stunned] Condition. Pass a Hard (-20) Endurance Test or gain the @Condition[Unconscious] Condition.

entries.name: Smashed Mouth
entries.description: With a sickening crunch, your mouth is suddenly filled with broken teeth and blood. Gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions. Lose [[/r 1d10]] teeth — @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.fBcZhOBn8IpoVqQ1]{Amputation (Easy)}.

entries.name: Smashed Rib Cage
entries.description: Gain a @Condition[Stunned] Condition that can only be removed through Medical Attention, and suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.EaqlLRQigwnsEAXX]{Broken Bone (Major)} injury.

entries.name: Sprain
entries.description: You sprain your arm, suffering a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.GlShFJF2TpsNh1FX]{Torn Muscle (Minor)} injury.

entries.name: Sprained Ankle
entries.description: You sprain your ankle, giving you a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.nF5z1OEhpi4t6a6S]{Torn Muscle (Minor)} injury.

entries.name: Struck Forehead
entries.description: A solid blow thumps into the centre of your forehead. Gain 2 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions and a @Condition[Blinded] Condition that cannot be removed until all Bleeding Conditions are removed.

entries.name: Stubbed Toe
entries.description: In the scuffle, you stub your toe. Pass a Average (+20) Endurance Test or suffer -10 on Agility Tests until the end of the next turn.

entries.name: Thigh Strike
entries.description: A painful blow slams into your upper thigh. Gain a @Condition[Bleeding] Condition and take an Average (+20) Endurance Test or stumble, gaining the @Condition[Prone] Condition.

entries.name: Tis But A Scratch!
entries.description: Gain 1 @Condition[Bleeding] Condition.

entries.name: Torn Apart
entries.description: You are hacked in two. The top half lands in a random direction, and all characters within 2 yards are showered in blood.

entries.name: Torn Muscles
entries.description: The blow slams into your forearm. Gain a @Condition[Bleeding] Condition and a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.GlShFJF2TpsNh1FX]{Torn Muscle (Minor)} injury.

entries.name: Torn Thigh
entries.description:
Gain 3 @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions as the weapon opens up your upper thigh. Pass a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test or gain the @Condition[Prone] Condition. Until you receive @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.WCivInLZrqEtZzF4#surgery]{Surgery} to stitch up the wound, each time you receive Damage to this Leg, also receive 1 @Condition[Bleeding] Condition.

The Active Effect for this item needs your input. Replace LEG_LOCATION HERE with lLeg or rLeg

entries.name: Twisted Ankle
entries.description: You go over your ankle, hurting it. Agility Tests suffer a -10 penalty for [[/r 1d10]] rounds.

entries.name: Twisted Back
entries.description: Suffer a @Compendium[wfrp4e-core.injuries.7rBhIRo96Mydo0Cv]{Torn Muscle (Minor)} injury.

entries.name: Twisted Knee
entries.description: You twist your knee too far. Agility Tests suffer a -20 penalty for [[/r 1d10]] rounds.

entries.name: Winded
entries.description: Gain a @Condition[Stunned] Condition. Make an Average (+20) Endurance Test, or gain the @Condition[Prone] Condition. Movement is halved for [[/r 1d10]] rounds as you get your breath back.

entries.name: Wrenched Arm
entries.description: Your arm is almost pulled from its socket. Drop whatever is held in the associated hand; the arm is useless for [[/r 1d10]] Rounds.

entries.name: Wrenched Collar Bone
entries.description: Randomly select one arm. Drop whatever is held in that hand; the arm is useless for [[/r 1d10]] rounds.
